meanings: (일자) job, work, (일터) office, workplace, place of work[employment]

examples.korean: They’re very hot on punctuality at work. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 직장에서의 시간 엄수에 대단히 엄격하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
